body:
So I don't know if a thread has already been made that's like this but whatever. The point is one person will take the diamond from the person above. This is how it works

Joe: I put the diamond in a chest and surround it in lava

Bob: I use fire resistance and open the chest and take the diamond and hide the diamond 256 blocks in the air covered in obsidian covers with regen walls.


So I'll start. 

I take the diamond put it in the chest and splash the chest with a invis potion.

(it doesn't have to seem real use your imagination on how to get the diamond)
